name: CQB Training Arena
summary: CQB: Where soldiers rise.    Engage in a close-quarters battle training simulation in VR. Closely based upon a real-life CQB arena, your mission is to gradually clear an entire building by eliminating enemy targets and releasing their hostages.     With a variety of weapons at your disposal, you are well-equipped to begin your training.     Your final score is based on speed and marksmanship. Do you have what it takes to sweep the premises and destroy your opponents?
